ppy/osu-server-beatmap-submission.summary: Recent activities include implementing required interactions with beatmap mirrors, enhancing test coverage, and addressing pending purge updates on osu_mirrors. These changes aim to improve the handling of cached packages and ensure seamless beatmap submission processes. The updates were thoroughly tested in a full-stack local environment and are part of ongoing efforts to enhance the osu-server-beatmap-submission repository.

ppy/osu.summary: The repository has seen significant activities focused on resolving issues and enhancing test coverage. Notably, fixes were implemented to address the slider end drag marker blocking the open of control point piece context menus, along with the addition of a failing test case and extra test coverage to prevent future regressions. These updates contribute to improving the overall user experience and stability of the osu application.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: Recent activities in the osu-wiki repository include updates to fix the incorrect display of profile pictures in Twitter profiles, specifically addressing the issue of a white box appearing behind osu!support's profile picture. These changes were tested against the contribution checklist to ensure they meet the required standards, reflecting the community's commitment to maintaining a high-quality osu! wiki.
